concept.title: DITA Structured Authoring
concept.shortdesc: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to DITA (Darwin Information Typing Architecture) structured authoring.

conbody.p: You will learn the core principles, key components, and practical applications of DITA to create consistent, reusable, and scalable technical documentation.

section.title: Course Audience
section.p: This course is designed for junior to mid-level technical writers, content creators, and content professionals who are looking to understand and apply structured authoring principles using DITA.
